parameter.name: multiplier
parameter.label: Multiplier
parameter.description: Multiplier to be applied on the state towards the item. The inverse will be applied on the commands from the item to the channel.

parameter.name: offset
parameter.label: Offset
parameter.description: Offset (plain number or number with unit) to be applied on the state towards the item. The negative offset will be applied in the reverse direction. The offset is added after the multiplier is applied. The resulting value is <tt>mX + b</tt> where m is the multiplier and b is the offset.
